update public.register
register_name = #{registerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where store_code = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and register_no = #{registerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.register ( store_code, register_no, register_name, short_name, open_priority, register_type, is_auto_open_target, max_allowance) VALUES ( #{storeCode}, #{registerNo}, #{registerName}, #{shortName}, #{openPriority}, #{registerType}, #{isAutoOpenTarget}, #{maxAllowance}) ON CONFLICT (store_code, register_no) DO UPDATE SET register_name = EXCLUDED.register_name, short_name = EXCLUDED.short_name, open_priority = EXCLUDED.open_priority, register_type = EXCLUDED.register_type, is_auto_open_target = EXCLUDED.is_auto_open_target, max_allowance = EXCLUDED.max_allowance
